tool_description: Analyzes the tone and emotional sentiment of email text to ensure appropriate professional communication style.

email_text.description: The email content to analyze for tone

target_tone.description: Desired tone: professional, friendly, assertive, apologetic, urgent, neutral

error_messages: Empty email text: Provide email content for tone analysis
Invalid target tone: Use one of [professional, friendly, assertive, apologetic, urgent, neutral]
Text too short: Provide at least 10 words for meaningful tone analysis
usage: Input the email_text and optionally specify the target_tone. The tool evaluates current tone and provides recommendations for alignment.

current_tone.description: Detected tone of the email text

tone_alignment.description: Whether current tone matches target tone

improvement_suggestions.description: Specific suggestions to achieve target tone
